mapper.insert: insert into tb_warehouse (warehouseId, warehouseName, warehouseImg, warehouseSn, cityId, address, deleted, createTime, updateTime, warehouseDesc) values (#{warehouseid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehousename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehousesn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{warehousedesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tb_warehouse set warehouseName = #{warehousename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, warehouseImg = #{warehouseimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, warehouseSn = #{warehousesn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cityId = #{cityid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, warehouseDesc = #{warehousedesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where warehouseId = #{warehouseid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select warehouseId, warehouseName, warehouseImg, warehouseSn, cityId, address, deleted, createTime, updateTime, warehouseDesc from tb_warehouse where warehouseId = #{warehouseid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select warehouseId, warehouseName, warehouseImg, warehouseSn, cityId, address, deleted, createTime, updateTime, warehouseDesc from tb_warehouse
